fields.fieldTitle: What is your name or the name of your company this page is about?
What is the area of focus for this website in 2-3 words?

fieldHint.hint1: "In a nutshell, this website is about _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: book writing; marketing funnels; marriage improvement, etc.
Ex: authors, funnel hackers, married couples, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 thing your audience really wants?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make more book sales; make more product sales; have a closer relationship, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #2 thing your audience really wants?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build up a big audience; build a huge customer base; rekindle that fire and romance, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #3 thing your audience really wants?

fieldHint.hint1: My audience also really wants to _____.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: bank big royalty checks; make big commissions; build a solid foundation of mutual support and trust, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BIG, GIANT payoff your target audience wants? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: write their books super fast; create amazing sales funnels in an hour; save their marriage, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Education: What education (formal or informal) do you have that would catch the attention of your target audience?

fieldHint.hint1: ** One thought / item per line per line becomes bulleted list

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Masters In Education; PhD. From School of Hard Knocks; Graduate of College of William and Mary; Self-taught copywriter and webmaster

fields.fieldTitle: Experience: What is your / the company's work or business experience as it relates to this website?

fieldHint.hint1: ** One thought / item per line becomes bulleted list

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: Spent 10 years as a syndicated newspaper columnist; Worked as VP of training for Fortune 500 Corp and trained 10,000 people annually; Taught for 15 years at prestigious college in area of expertise, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Kudos: What awards, titles, and /or designations do you / the company have that are relevant to your target audience?

fieldHint.hint1: ** One thought / item per line becomes bulleted list

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Toastmasters; CSP/CPAE from National Speakers Association; Golden Gavel Winner; Amazon Best Selling Author of numerous books, including "Zombie Apocalypse Diaries" and "Book Writing Mistakes"

fields.fieldTitle: The Right: What are some things about you / the company that give you the "right" to help people in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: ** One thought / item per line becomes bulleted list

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Started selling ebooks in 1997; Been written up in the NY Times and Entrepreneur Magazine; Spoken in 22 countries on self publishing; Have customers in over 100+ countries around the globe.

fields.fieldTitle: Cool Fun Facts: What are some super cool things about the you / the company that people would think were really interesting and show "true character?"

fieldHint.hint1: ** One thought / item per line becomes bulleted list

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Wrestled in College; Featured on front cover of New York Times; Spoke in 7 different countries in 6 days; Grandpa at age 39; went from bankrupt to a paid off house in 18 months, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Obstacles: What are some big obstacles you / the company have overcome in life or business?

fieldHint.hint1: ** One thought / item per line becomes bulleted list

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Prostate Cancer Survivor; Bankruptcy; Lived in a trailer park for 7 years; Developed a heart condition at age 31, etc
